summary: This module defines a suite of unit tests for the Cython debugging infrastructure. It includes helper classes that manage temporary build environments, compile Cython extensions, and clean up after tests. Specialized test cases target GDB integration, and a utility class can invoke the complete test collection.
business_intent: Validate the functionality and stability of Cython's debugger components, especially the interaction with GDB, to ensure developers can reliably debug generated C code and to prevent regressions in the debugging workflow.
